solution_line_template: The rest of the neighborhood collected {neighborhood_multiplier} * {gina_bags} = <<{neighborhood_multiplier}*{gina_bags}={neighborhood_bags}>>{neighborhood_bags} bags of litter.
With Gina's bags, they had {neighborhood_bags} + {gina_bags} = <<{neighborhood_bags}+{gina_bags}={total_bags}>>{total_bags} bags of litter.
